dandiset.description: The unique identifier for your Dandiset. Can also be created or searched by title.

number_of_jobs.title: Job Count
number_of_jobs.description:
The number of files to upload in parallel.
Note: If you encounter an error for any selector value, particularly a Segmentation Fault error, try a value of 1 to run the jobs without parallelization.

number_of_threads.title: Threads per Job
number_of_threads.description: The number of threads to handle each file.
